Notes: The main collectible in most levels. A Power Star usually represents one specific scenario. When collecting it, a short cutscene will be played. If this object is a Grand Star and the current galaxy is VsKoopaLv3Galaxy, Peach will appear during the Star Get cutscene. A GeneralPos with the name スターゲットデモ座標 can be used to specify the position and rotation of its Star Get cutscene.

Obj_arg0.Name: Power Star ID
Obj_arg0.Description: The scenario to which this Power Star belongs. Should be a valid ID.

Obj_arg1.Name: Unknown 1
Obj_arg1.Description: Related to gravity during appearance cutscene.

Obj_arg5.Name: Shadow Length
Obj_arg5.Description: Sets the shadow drop length. Default is 1000.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Group.Description: Used to group this object with other PowerStarAppearPoint instances. If the Power Star appears, it will spawn at the instance that the player is closest to. Limit is 16 objects per group.

Camera.Description: Used when the Power Star appears.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. It can use two special cutscene nerves. ミニ太陽消失 and グランドスター復活.

MirrorActor.Description: A mirrored version of this object is created for mirror reflection setups.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc. Only supported in HoneyBeeVillageGalaxy2, MokumokuValleyGalaxy2, TwisterTowerGalaxy3 and UndergroundDangeonGalaxy2.
